00003 SEXP dMatrix_validate(SEXP obj)
00004 {
00005     SEXP x = GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_xSym),
00006         Dim = GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym);
00007     int m, n;
00008 
00009     if (length(Dim) != 2)
00010         return mkString(_("Dim slot must have length 2"));
00011     m = INTEGER(Dim)[0]; n = INTEGER(Dim)[1];
00012     if (m < 0 || n < 0)
00013         return mkString(_("Negative value(s) in Dim"));
00014     if (!isReal(x))
00015         return mkString(_("x slot must be numeric \"double\""));
00016     return ScalarLogical(1);
00017 }
00018 
00019 SEXP dgeMatrix_validate(SEXP obj)
00020 {
00021     SEXP val,
00022         fact = GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_factorSym);
00023 
00024     if (isString(val = dense_nonpacked_validate(obj)))
00025         return(val);
00026 
00027     if (length(fact) > 0 && getAttrib(fact, R_NamesSymbol) == R_NilValue)
00028         return mkString(_("factors slot must be named list"));
00029     return ScalarLogical(1);
00030 }
00031 
00032 static
00033 double get_norm(SEXP obj, const char *typstr)
00034 {
00035     if(any_NA(obj))
00036         return NA_REAL;
00037     else {
00038         char typnm[] = {'\0', '\0'};
00039         int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym));
00040         double *work = (double *) NULL;
00041 
00042         typnm[0] = La_norm_type(typstr);
00043         if (*typnm == 'I') {
00044             work = (double *) R_alloc(dims[0], sizeof(double));
00045         }
00046         return F77_CALL(dlange)(typstr, dims, dims+1,
00047                                 REAL(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_xSym)),
00048                                 dims, work);
00049     }
00050 }
00051 
00052 SEXP dgeMatrix_norm(SEXP obj, SEXP type)
00053 {
00054     return ScalarReal(get_norm(obj, CHAR(asChar(type))));
00055 }
00056 
00057 SEXP dgeMatrix_rcond(SEXP obj, SEXP type)
00058 {
00059     SEXP LU = PROTECT(dgeMatrix_LU(obj));
00060     char typnm[] = {'\0', '\0'};
00061     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(LU, Matrix_DimSym)), info;
00062     double anorm, rcond;
00063 
00064     if (dims[0] != dims[1] || dims[0] < 1) {
00065         UNPROTECT(1);
00066         error(_("rcond requires a square, non-empty matrix"));
00067     }
00068     typnm[0] = La_rcond_type(CHAR(asChar(type)));
00069     anorm = get_norm(obj, typnm);
00070     F77_CALL(dgecon)(typnm,
00071                      dims, REAL(GET_SLOT(LU, Matrix_xSym)),
00072                      dims, &anorm, &rcond,
00073                      (double *) R_alloc(4*dims[0], sizeof(double)),
00074                      (int *) R_alloc(dims[0], sizeof(int)), &info);
00075     UNPROTECT(1);
00076     return ScalarReal(rcond);
00077 }

00079 SEXP dgeMatrix_crossprod(SEXP x, SEXP trans)
00080 {
00081     int tr = asLogical(trans);/* trans=TRUE: tcrossprod(x) */
00082     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dpoMatrix"))),
00083         nms = VECTOR_ELT(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym), tr ? 0 : 1),
00084         vDnms = ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimNamesSym, VECSXP, 2);
00085     int *Dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)),
00086         *vDims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00087     int k = tr ? Dims[1] : Dims[0], n = tr ? Dims[0] : Dims[1];
00088     double *vx = REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, n * n)),
00089         one = 1.0, zero = 0.0;
00090 
00091     AZERO(vx, n * n);
00092     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_uploSym, mkString("U"));
00093     ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_factorSym, VECSXP, 0);
00094     vDims[0] = vDims[1] = n;
00095     SET_VECTOR_ELT(vDnms, 0, duplicate(nms));
00096     SET_VECTOR_ELT(vDnms, 1, duplicate(nms));
00097     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", tr ? "N" : "T", &n, &k,
00098                     &one, REAL(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym)), Dims,
00099                     &zero, vx, &n);
00100     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_factorSym, allocVector(VECSXP, 0));
00101     UNPROTECT(1);
00102     return val;
00103 }
00104 
00105 SEXP dgeMatrix_dgeMatrix_crossprod(SEXP x, SEXP y, SEXP trans)
00106 {
00107     int tr = asLogical(trans);/* trans=TRUE: tcrossprod(x,y) */
00108     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgeMatrix")));
00109     int *xDims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)),
00110         *yDims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(y, Matrix_DimSym)),
00111         *vDims;
00112     int m  = xDims[!tr],  n = yDims[!tr];/* -> result dim */
00113     int xd = xDims[ tr], yd = yDims[ tr];/* the conformable dims */
00114     double one = 1.0, zero = 0.0;
00115 
00116     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_factorSym, allocVector(VECSXP, 0));
00117     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, allocVector(INTSXP, 2));
00118     vDims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym));
00119     if (xd > 0 && yd > 0 && n > 0 && m > 0) {
00120         if (xd != yd)
00121             error(_("Dimensions of x and y are not compatible for %s"),
00122                   tr ? "tcrossprod" : "crossprod");
00123         vDims[0] = m; vDims[1] = n;
00124         SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, allocVector(REALSXP, m * n));
00125         F77_CALL(dgemm)(tr ? "N" : "T", tr ? "T" : "N", &m, &n, &xd, &one,
00126                         REAL(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym)), xDims,
00127                         REAL(GET_SLOT(y, Matrix_xSym)), yDims,
00128                         &zero, REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)), &m);
00129     }
00130     UNPROTECT(1);
00131     return val;
00132 }
00133 
00134 SEXP dgeMatrix_matrix_crossprod(SEXP x, SEXP y, SEXP trans)
00135 {
00136     int tr = asLogical(trans);/* trans=TRUE: tcrossprod(x,y) */
00137     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgeMatrix")));
00138     int *xDims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)),
00139         *yDims = INTEGER(getAttrib(y, R_DimSymbol)),
00140         *vDims, nprot = 1;
00141     int m  = xDims[!tr],  n = yDims[!tr];/* -> result dim */
00142     int xd = xDims[ tr], yd = yDims[ tr];/* the conformable dims */
00143     double one = 1.0, zero = 0.0;
00144 
00145     if (isInteger(y)) {
00146         y = PROTECT(coerceVector(y, REALSXP));
00147         nprot++;
00148     }
00149     if (!(isMatrix(y) && isReal(y)))
00150         error(_("Argument y must be a numeric matrix"));
00151     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_factorSym, allocVector(VECSXP, 0));
00152     SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, allocVector(INTSXP, 2));
00153     vDims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym));
00154     if (xd > 0 && yd > 0 && n > 0 && m > 0) {
00155         if (xd != yd)
00156             error(_("Dimensions of x and y are not compatible for %s"),
00157                   tr ? "tcrossprod" : "crossprod");
00158         vDims[0] = m; vDims[1] = n;
00159         SET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, allocVector(REALSXP, m * n));
00160         F77_CALL(dgemm)(tr ? "N" : "T", tr ? "T" : "N", &m, &n, &xd, &one,
00161                         REAL(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym)), xDims,
00162                         REAL(y), yDims,
00163                         &zero, REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)), &m);
00164     }
00165     UNPROTECT(nprot);
00166     return val;
00167 }

00170 SEXP dgeMatrix_getDiag(SEXP x)
00171 {
00172 #define geMatrix_getDiag_1                                      \
00173     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym));            \
00174     int i, m = dims[0], nret = (m < dims[1]) ? m : dims[1];     \
00175     SEXP x_x = GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym)
00176 
00177     geMatrix_getDiag_1;
00178     SEXP ret = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, nret));
00179     double *rv = REAL(ret),
00180            *xv = REAL(x_x);
00181 
00182 #define geMatrix_getDiag_2                      \
00183     for (i = 0; i < nret; i++) {                \
00184         rv[i] = xv[i * (m + 1)];                \
00185     }                                           \
00186     UNPROTECT(1);                               \
00187     return ret
00188 
00189     geMatrix_getDiag_2;
00190 }
00191 
00192 SEXP lgeMatrix_getDiag(SEXP x)
00193 {
00194     geMatrix_getDiag_1;
00195 
00196     SEXP ret = PROTECT(allocVector(LGLSXP, nret));
00197     int *rv = LOGICAL(ret),
00198         *xv = LOGICAL(x_x);
00199 
00200     geMatrix_getDiag_2;
00201 }
00202 
00203 #undef geMatrix_getDiag_1
00204 #undef geMatrix_getDiag_2
00205 
00206 
00207 SEXP dgeMatrix_LU(SEXP x)
00208 {
00209     SEXP val = get_factors(x, "LU");
00210     int *dims, npiv, info;
00211 
00212     if (val != R_NilValue) /* nothing to do if it's there in 'factors' slot */
00213         return val;
00214     dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym));
00215     if (dims[0] < 1 || dims[1] < 1)
00216         error(_("Cannot factor a matrix with zero extents"));
00217     npiv = (dims[0] <dims[1]) ? dims[0] : dims[1];
00218     val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("denseLU")));
00219     slot_dup(val, x, Matrix_xSym);
00220     slot_dup(val, x, Matrix_DimSym);
00221     F77_CALL(dgetrf)(dims, dims + 1, REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)),
00222                      dims,
00223                      INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_permSym, INTSXP, npiv)),
00224                      &info);
00225     if (info < 0)
00226         error(_("Lapack routine %s returned error code %d"), "dgetrf", info);
00227     else if (info > 0)
00228         warning(_("Exact singularity detected during LU decomposition."));
00229     UNPROTECT(1);
00230     return set_factors(x, val, "LU");
00231 }
00232 
00233 SEXP dgeMatrix_determinant(SEXP x, SEXP logarithm)
00234 {
00235     int lg = asLogical(logarithm);
00236     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym)),
00237         n = dims[0], sign = 1;
00238     double modulus = lg ? 0. : 1; /* initialize; = result for n == 0 */
00239 
00240     if (n != dims[1])
00241         error(_("Determinant requires a square matrix"));
00242     if (n > 0) {
00243         SEXP lu = dgeMatrix_LU(x);
00244         int i, *jpvt = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(lu, Matrix_permSym));
00245         double *luvals = REAL(GET_SLOT(lu, Matrix_xSym));
00246 
00247         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) if (jpvt[i] != (i + 1)) sign = -sign;
00248         if (lg) {
00249             for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00250                 double dii = luvals[i*(n + 1)]; /* ith diagonal element */
00251                 modulus += log(dii < 0 ? -dii : dii);
00252                 if (dii < 0) sign = -sign;
00253             }
00254         } else {
00255             for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
00256                 modulus *= luvals[i*(n + 1)];
00257             if (modulus < 0) {
00258                 modulus = -modulus;
00259                 sign = -sign;
00260             }
00261         }
00262     }
00263     return as_det_obj(modulus, lg, sign);
00264 }
00265 
00266 SEXP dgeMatrix_solve(SEXP a)
00267 {
00268     SEXP val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgeMatrix"))),
00269         lu = dgeMatrix_LU(a);
00270     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(lu, Matrix_DimSym)),
00271         *pivot = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(lu, Matrix_permSym));
00272     double *x, tmp;
00273     int info, lwork = -1;
00274 
00275 
00276     if (dims[0] != dims[1]) error(_("Solve requires a square matrix"));
00277     slot_dup(val, lu, Matrix_xSym);
00278     x = REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym));
00279     slot_dup(val, lu, Matrix_DimSym);
00280     F77_CALL(dgetri)(dims, x, dims, pivot, &tmp, &lwork, &info);
00281     lwork = (int) tmp;
00282     F77_CALL(dgetri)(dims, x, dims, pivot,
00283                      (double *) R_alloc((size_t) lwork, sizeof(double)),
00284                      &lwork, &info);
00285     if (info)
00286         error(_("Lapack routine dgetri: system is exactly singular"));
00287     UNPROTECT(1);
00288     return val;
00289 }
00290 
00291 SEXP dgeMatrix_matrix_solve(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00292 {
00293     SEXP val = PROTECT(dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b)),
00294         lu = PROTECT(dgeMatrix_LU(a));
00295     int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(lu, Matrix_DimSym)),
00296         *bdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym));
00297     int info, n = bdims[0], nrhs = bdims[1];
00298 
00299     if (*adims != *bdims || bdims[1] < 1 || *adims < 1 || *adims != adims[1])
00300         error(_("Dimensions of system to be solved are inconsistent"));
00301     F77_CALL(dgetrs)("N", &n, &nrhs, REAL(GET_SLOT(lu, Matrix_xSym)), &n,
00302                      INTEGER(GET_SLOT(lu, Matrix_permSym)),
00303                      REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)), &n, &info);
00304     if (info)
00305         error(_("Lapack routine dgetrs: system is exactly singular"));
00306     UNPROTECT(2);
00307     return val;
00308 }
00309 
00310 SEXP dgeMatrix_matrix_mm(SEXP a, SEXP bP, SEXP right)
00311 {
00312     SEXP b = PROTECT(mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(bP)),
00313         val = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgeMatrix")));
00314     int *adims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_DimSym)),
00315         *bdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(b, Matrix_DimSym)),
00316         *cdims = INTEGER(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimSym, INTSXP, 2));
00317     double one = 1., zero = 0.;
00318 
00319     if (asLogical(right)) {
00320         int m = bdims[0], n = adims[1], k = bdims[1];
00321         if (adims[0] != k)
00322             error(_("Matrices are not conformable for multiplication"));
00323         cdims[0] = m; cdims[1] = n;
00324         if (m < 1 || n < 1 || k < 1) {
00325 /*          error(_("Matrices with zero extents cannot be multiplied")); */
00326             ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, m * n);
00327         } else
00328             F77_CALL(dgemm) ("N", "N", &m, &n, &k, &one,
00329                              REAL(GET_SLOT(b, Matrix_xSym)), &m,
00330                              REAL(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_xSym)), &k, &zero,
00331                              REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, m * n)),
00332                              &m);
00333     } else {
00334         int m = adims[0], n = bdims[1], k = adims[1];
00335 
00336         if (bdims[0] != k)
00337             error(_("Matrices are not conformable for multiplication"));
00338         cdims[0] = m; cdims[1] = n;
00339         if (m < 1 || n < 1 || k < 1) {
00340 /*          error(_("Matrices with zero extents cannot be multiplied")); */
00341             ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, m * n);
00342         } else
00343             F77_CALL(dgemm)
00344                 ("N", "N", &m, &n, &k, &one, REAL(GET_SLOT(a, Matrix_xSym)),
00345                  &m, REAL(GET_SLOT(b, Matrix_xSym)), &k, &zero,
00346                  REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, m * n)), &m);
00347     }
00348     ALLOC_SLOT(val, Matrix_DimNamesSym, VECSXP, 2);
00349     UNPROTECT(2);
00350     return val;
00351 }

00353 
00354 SEXP dgeMatrix_svd(SEXP x, SEXP nnu, SEXP nnv)
00355 {
00356     int /* nu = asInteger(nnu),
00357            nv = asInteger(nnv), */
00358         *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym));
00359     double *xx = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym));
00360     SEXP val = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 3));
00361 
00362     if (dims[0] && dims[1]) {
00363         int m = dims[0], n = dims[1], mm = (m < n)?m:n,
00364             lwork = -1, info;
00365         double tmp, *work;
00366         int *iwork = Alloca(8 * mm, int);
00367         R_CheckStack();
00368 
00369         SET_VECTOR_ELT(val, 0, allocVector(REALSXP, mm));
00370         SET_VECTOR_ELT(val, 1, allocMatrix(REALSXP, m, mm));
00371         SET_VECTOR_ELT(val, 2, allocMatrix(REALSXP, mm, n));
00372         F77_CALL(dgesdd)("S", &m, &n, xx, &m,
00373                          REAL(VECTOR_ELT(val, 0)),
00374                          REAL(VECTOR_ELT(val, 1)), &m,
00375                          REAL(VECTOR_ELT(val, 2)), &mm,
00376                          &tmp, &lwork, iwork, &info);
00377         lwork = (int) tmp;
00378         work = Alloca(lwork, double);
00379         R_CheckStack();
00380         F77_CALL(dgesdd)("S", &m, &n, xx, &m,
00381                          REAL(VECTOR_ELT(val, 0)),
00382                          REAL(VECTOR_ELT(val, 1)), &m,
00383                          REAL(VECTOR_ELT(val, 2)), &mm,
00384                          work, &lwork, iwork, &info);
00385 
00386     }
00387     UNPROTECT(1);
00388     return val;
00389 }
00390 
00391 const static double padec [] = /* for matrix exponential calculation. */
00392 {
00393   5.0000000000000000e-1,
00394   1.1666666666666667e-1,
00395   1.6666666666666667e-2,
00396   1.6025641025641026e-3,
00397   1.0683760683760684e-4,
00398   4.8562548562548563e-6,
00399   1.3875013875013875e-7,
00400   1.9270852604185938e-9,
00401 };
00402 
00410 SEXP dgeMatrix_exp(SEXP x)
00411 {
00412     const double one = 1.0, zero = 0.0;
00413     const int i1 = 1;
00414     int *Dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym));
00415     const int n = Dims[1], nsqr = n * n, np1 = n + 1;
00416 
00417     SEXP val = PROTECT(duplicate(x));
00418     int i, ilo, ilos, ihi, ihis, j, sqpow;
00419     int *pivot = Calloc(n, int);
00420     double *dpp = Calloc(nsqr, double), /* denominator power Pade' */
00421         *npp = Calloc(nsqr, double), /* numerator power Pade' */
00422         *perm = Calloc(n, double),
00423         *scale = Calloc(n, double),
00424         *v = REAL(GET_SLOT(val, Matrix_xSym)),
00425         *work = Calloc(nsqr, double), inf_norm, m1_j/*= (-1)^j */, trshift;
00426     R_CheckStack();
00427 
00428     if (n < 1 || Dims[0] != n)
00429         error(_("Matrix exponential requires square, non-null matrix"));
00430     if(n == 1) {
00431         v[0] = exp(v[0]);
00432         UNPROTECT(1);
00433         return val;
00434     }
00435 
00436     /* Preconditioning 1.  Shift diagonal by average diagonal if positive. */
00437     trshift = 0;                /* determine average diagonal element */
00438     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) trshift += v[i * np1];
00439     trshift /= n;
00440     if (trshift > 0.) {         /* shift diagonal by -trshift */
00441         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) v[i * np1] -= trshift;
00442     }
00443 
00444     /* Preconditioning 2. Balancing with dgebal. */
00445     F77_CALL(dgebal)("P", &n, v, &n, &ilo, &ihi, perm, &j);
00446     if (j) error(_("dgeMatrix_exp: LAPACK routine dgebal returned %d"), j);
00447     F77_CALL(dgebal)("S", &n, v, &n, &ilos, &ihis, scale, &j);
00448     if (j) error(_("dgeMatrix_exp: LAPACK routine dgebal returned %d"), j);
00449 
00450     /* Preconditioning 3. Scaling according to infinity norm */
00451     inf_norm = F77_CALL(dlange)("I", &n, &n, v, &n, work);
00452     sqpow = (inf_norm > 0) ? (int) (1 + log(inf_norm)/log(2.)) : 0;
00453     if (sqpow < 0) sqpow = 0;
00454     if (sqpow > 0) {
00455         double scale_factor = 1.0;
00456         for (i = 0; i < sqpow; i++) scale_factor *= 2.;
00457         for (i = 0; i < nsqr; i++) v[i] /= scale_factor;
00458     }
00459 
00460     /* Pade' approximation. Powers v^8, v^7, ..., v^1 */
00461     AZERO(npp, nsqr);
00462     AZERO(dpp, nsqr);
00463     m1_j = -1;
00464     for (j = 7; j >=0; j--) {
00465         double mult = padec[j];
00466         /* npp = m * npp + padec[j] *m */
00467         F77_CALL(dgemm)("N", "N", &n, &n, &n, &one, v, &n, npp, &n,
00468                         &zero, work, &n);
00469         for (i = 0; i < nsqr; i++) npp[i] = work[i] + mult * v[i];
00470         /* dpp = m * dpp + (m1_j * padec[j]) * m */
00471         mult *= m1_j;
00472         F77_CALL(dgemm)("N", "N", &n, &n, &n, &one, v, &n, dpp, &n,
00473                         &zero, work, &n);
00474         for (i = 0; i < nsqr; i++) dpp[i] = work[i] + mult * v[i];
00475         m1_j *= -1;
00476     }
00477     /* Zero power */
00478     for (i = 0; i < nsqr; i++) dpp[i] *= -1.;
00479     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00480         npp[j * np1] += 1.;
00481         dpp[j * np1] += 1.;
00482     }
00483 
00484     /* Pade' approximation is solve(dpp, npp) */
00485     F77_CALL(dgetrf)(&n, &n, dpp, &n, pivot, &j);
00486     if (j) error(_("dgeMatrix_exp: dgetrf returned error code %d"), j);
00487     F77_CALL(dgetrs)("N", &n, &n, dpp, &n, pivot, npp, &n, &j);
00488     if (j) error(_("dgeMatrix_exp: dgetrs returned error code %d"), j);
00489     Memcpy(v, npp, nsqr);
00490 
00491     /* Now undo all of the preconditioning */
00492     /* Preconditioning 3: square the result for every power of 2 */
00493     while (sqpow--) {
00494         F77_CALL(dgemm)("N", "N", &n, &n, &n, &one, v, &n, v, &n,
00495                         &zero, work, &n);
00496         Memcpy(v, work, nsqr);
00497     }
00498     /* Preconditioning 2: apply inverse scaling */
00499     for (j = 0; j < n; j++)
00500         for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
00501             v[i + j * n] *= scale[i]/scale[j];
00502 
00503 
00504     /* 2 b) Inverse permutation  (if not the identity permutation) */
00505     if (ilo != 1 || ihi != n) {
00506         /* Martin Maechler's code */
00507 
00508 #define SWAP_ROW(I,J) F77_CALL(dswap)(&n, &v[(I)], &n, &v[(J)], &n)
00509 
00510 #define SWAP_COL(I,J) F77_CALL(dswap)(&n, &v[(I)*n], &i1, &v[(J)*n], &i1)
00511 
00512 #define RE_PERMUTE(I)                           \
00513         int p_I = (int) (perm[I]) - 1;          \
00514         SWAP_COL(I, p_I);                       \
00515         SWAP_ROW(I, p_I)
00516 
00517         /* reversion of "leading permutations" : in reverse order */
00518         for (i = (ilo - 1) - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00519             RE_PERMUTE(i);
00520         }
00521 
00522         /* reversion of "trailing permutations" : applied in forward order */
00523         for (i = (ihi + 1) - 1; i < n; i++) {
00524             RE_PERMUTE(i);
00525         }
00526     }
00527 
00528     /* Preconditioning 1: Trace normalization */
00529     if (trshift > 0.) {
00530         double mult = exp(trshift);
00531         for (i = 0; i < nsqr; i++) v[i] *= mult;
00532     }
00533 
00534     /* Clean up */
00535     Free(work); Free(scale); Free(perm); Free(npp); Free(dpp); Free(pivot);
00536     UNPROTECT(1);
00537     return val;
00538 }
00539 
00540 SEXP dgeMatrix_Schur(SEXP x, SEXP vectors)
00541 {
00542     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym));
00543     int vecs = asLogical(vectors), info, izero = 0, lwork = -1, n = dims[0];
00544     double *work, tmp;
00545     char *nms[] = {"WR", "WI", "T", "Z", ""};
00546     SEXP val = PROTECT(Matrix_make_named(VECSXP, nms));
00547 
00548     if (n != dims[1] || n < 1)
00549         error(_("dgeMatrix_Schur: argument x must be a non-null square matrix"));
00550     SET_VECTOR_ELT(val, 0, allocVector(REALSXP, n));
00551     SET_VECTOR_ELT(val, 1, allocVector(REALSXP, n));
00552     SET_VECTOR_ELT(val, 2, allocMatrix(REALSXP, n, n));
00553     Memcpy(REAL(VECTOR_ELT(val, 2)), REAL(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym)), n * n);
00554     SET_VECTOR_ELT(val, 3, allocMatrix(REALSXP, vecs ? n : 0, vecs ? n : 0));
00555     F77_CALL(dgees)(vecs ? "V" : "N", "N", NULL, dims, (double *) NULL, dims, &izero,
00556                     (double *) NULL, (double *) NULL, (double *) NULL, dims,
00557                     &tmp, &lwork, (int *) NULL, &info);
00558     if (info) error(_("dgeMatrix_Schur: first call to dgees failed"));
00559     lwork = (int) tmp;
00560     work = Alloca(lwork, double);
00561     R_CheckStack();
00562     F77_CALL(dgees)(vecs ? "V" : "N", "N", NULL, dims, REAL(VECTOR_ELT(val, 2)), dims,
00563                     &izero, REAL(VECTOR_ELT(val, 0)), REAL(VECTOR_ELT(val, 1)),
00564                     REAL(VECTOR_ELT(val, 3)), dims, work, &lwork,
00565                     (int *) NULL, &info);
00566     if (info) error(_("dgeMatrix_Schur: dgees returned code %d"), info);
00567     UNPROTECT(1);
00568     return val;
00569 }
00570 
00571 SEXP dgeMatrix_colsums(SEXP x, SEXP naRmP, SEXP cols, SEXP mean)
00572 {
00573     int keepNA = !asLogical(naRmP);
00574     int doMean = asLogical(mean);
00575     int useCols = asLogical(cols);
00576     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym));
00577     int i, j, m = dims[0], n = dims[1];
00578     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, (useCols) ? n : m));
00579     double *aa = REAL(ans), *xx = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym));
00580 
00581     if (useCols) {  /* col(Sums|Means) : */
00582         int cnt = m;
00583         for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00584             double *rx = xx + m * j;
00585 
00586             aa[j] = 0;
00587             if (keepNA)
00588                 for (i = 0; i < m; i++) aa[j] += rx[i];
00589             else {
00590                 cnt = 0;
00591                 for (i = 0; i < m; i++)
00592                     if (!ISNAN(rx[i])) {cnt++; aa[j] += rx[i];}
00593             }
00594             if (doMean) {
00595                 if (cnt > 0) aa[j] /= cnt; else aa[j] = NA_REAL;
00596             }
00597         }
00598     } else { /* row(Sums|Means) : */
00599         double *Count = ((!keepNA) && doMean) ?
00600             Alloca(m, double) : (double*)NULL ;
00601         R_CheckStack();
00602 
00603         for (i = 0; i < m; i++) aa[i] = 0.0;
00604         for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00605             if (keepNA)
00606                 for (i = 0; i < m; i++) aa[i] += xx[i + j * m];
00607             else
00608                 for (i = 0; i < m; i++) {
00609                     double el = xx[i + j * m];
00610                     if (!ISNAN(el)) {
00611                         aa[i] += el;
00612                         if (doMean) Count[i]++;
00613                     }
00614                 }
00615         }
00616         if (doMean) {
00617             if (keepNA)
00618                 for (i = 0; i < m; i++) aa[i] /= n;
00619             else
00620                 for (i = 0; i < m; i++)
00621                     aa[i] = (Count[i]>0)? aa[i]/Count[i]: NA_REAL;
00622         }
00623     }
00624 
00625     UNPROTECT(1);
00626     return ans;
00627 }
